overview: What would you do if you tried to be faithful to one fabulous female but had the world's most gorgeous women out to get you waylaid, parlaid and laid? Well, that's the predicament faced by the hero, Steven, in the sizzling glittering low down on Manhattan's elite "Secret Mistress." A continuous succession of centerspread models and insatiable housewives bombard him with the most tempting, torrid and tantalizing provocations, and though the weakens some (who wouldn't), he still hankers for that special brand of sex with his secret mistress.
tagline: Her Insatiable Hunger For Sex Drove Him Wild!
title: Secret Mistress
